H0.text: Which drink, popular in the Middle Ages, is prepared by curdling hot milk with wine or ale, and adding spices. Hypocras

H1.text: Which drink, popular in the Middle Ages, is prepared by curdling hot milk with wine or ale, and adding spices. March Beer

H2.text: Which drink, popular in the Middle Ages, is prepared by curdling hot milk with wine or ale, and adding spices. Sack Posca

H3.text: Which drink, popular in the Middle Ages, is prepared by curdling hot milk with wine or ale, and adding spices. Posset

A4.text: Hippocras is a drink made from wine mixed with sugar and spices.

A5.text: Hippocras is a wine-based spiced drink, not a milk-based posset.

A6.text: French recipes for honey sweetened spiced wines.
